data.name: Escape Dinosaur Island
data.detailed_description: In the future world, a super boy accidentally crossed an island in the age of dinosaurs while driving a spaceship. The spaceship was forced to land and damaged. He can only stick to the island day and night, protect himself and eliminate the dinosaur and mecha dinosaur boss who attacked him. When the sun rises again, the boy has accumulated enough energy to repair the spaceship and return.
data.about_the_game: In the future world, a super boy accidentally crossed an island in the age of dinosaurs while driving a spaceship. The spaceship was forced to land and damaged. When the sun rises again, the boy has accumulated enough energy to repair the spaceship and return.
